def Load(widget): from System.Threading import Thread from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerPrincipal
activeRole = BennerPrincipal.Current.ActiveRole
widget.Hidden = not (activeRole == "K_CRM_SDR_V2" )#or activeRole == "K_CRM_BDR_SINCK") #Thread.CurrentPrincipal.IsInRole("K_CRM_SDR_V2")
